author: whokion
body: The CMS Celeritas integration team (@sanmayphy and @kpedro88 ) has successfully integrated the CPU-only version of Celeritas into the CMSSW detector simulation workflow. We would now like to enable GPU support to begin testing and validating Celeritas offloading on CUDA-capable devices within CMSSW.
title: Add configuration option to build Celeritas with CUDA
